snippet: A documentary by Gary Null and Valerie Van Cleve, “Poverty Inc.” finds modern-day slavery and indentured servitude spawned by corporate practices.
abstract: Anita Gates reviews Gary Null and Valerie Van Cleve documentary film Poverty Inc.
lead_paragraph: A documentary by Gary Null and Valerie Van Cleve, “Poverty Inc.” finds modern-day slavery and indentured servitude spawned by corporate practices.

headline.print_headline: The Corporate Creation of a New Class Structure
headline.seo: ‘Poverty Inc.’ Paints a Bleak Picture of Life After 2008
headline.main: The Corporate Creation of a New Class Structure
